extraSections.text:
# Cattyverse Paddock Club Play To Earn Game!

Paddock Club members will be able interact with various reward and mining systems within the project to earn real-life income with various Web3-based game modes and also build the community with weekly events. With these events, users can enjoy playing and earning at the same time.  This will help create a social environment and strengthen the bond between members in-game. Paddock Club will host LIVE music from recognized artists and DJs.

Members will also earn coins in the game and use them to buy items such as houses, cars, pets, etc. Paddock Club members will be able to customize their characters and use them within the game. The game has a built-in ranking system, where members can earn a specific titles and status, becoming exclusive members of the Paddock Club.

# STATS

 ### SUPPLY

 * Gen 1: 1,111 NFTs
 * Gen 2: 1,111 NFTs
 * Gen 3: 1,111 NFTs
 * **Total: 3,333 NFTs**

**Note: At MOST 5x NFTs will be available to mint per user.**

 ### PRICE

  * Whitelist Price: 4 NEAR
 * Public Mint: 6 NEAR

 ### DATE & TIME

 * WL Mint: June 09  16:00 UTC (VIP Sale Length 22 Hours)
 * Public Mint: June 10

 ### ROYALTY

 * Rate: %7

# The Low Down

 ### $6,666 GIVEAWAY

 * GEN 1: 1 person who owns at least 10 of the Cattyverse Paddock Club NFTs will receive a **$1,111** prize.
 * GEN 2: 1 person who owns at least 10 of the Cattyverse Paddock Club NFTs will receive a **$2,222** prize.
 * GEN 3: 1 person who owns at least 10 of the Cattyverse Paddock Club NFTs will receive a **$3,333**.

### PLAY TO EARN!

 Members that own Cattyverse Paddock Club NFTs will be able to earn NEAR in our upcoming Web3 game.

### CATTYVERSE STYLE

One thing for sure - Cattyverse is all about style! Add some flair to your characters with a variety of clothing, hats and accessories.

 ### PADDOCK CLUB SPECIAL

 * Hit the jackpot in multiplayer competition, where you can make it big time by winning a pool of prizes.
 * Access exclusive events in the Paddock Club, including shows from musicians and artists around the globe or a set from your favorite DJ!
 * Earn prestigious awards and prizes including Cattyverse NFTs, NEAR tokens, titles and more!
